author: JaDropping Science
description:
As mentioned in the Season 4 premiere, I took a poll on whether to bring back options D and E this season, and it was overwhelmingly a yes to both. It's worth noting those options will rarely (if ever) be used though. That way I will almost always stick to the name of the game, while still keeping you on your toes. Thanks for watching!

Here's links to the marathons of all seasons of 2 Truths & Trash if you haven't seen them all. Enjoy!
Season 1: https://youtu.be/SsbuanXFlKs
Season 2: https://youtu.be/8Tx3YdetszU
Season 3: https://youtu.be/_oqBGangLOc

Want to help support the making of more videos? 
Consider buying me a coffee:
https://buymeacoffee.com/jadroppingscience

You can find my 2 Truths & Trash Science Trivia Deck here:
https://twotruthsandtrash.com/

Looking for a cool gift to give your science-loving friend or family member? 
Check out my website: https://coolsciencefinds.com/

Disclaimer: I make a small commission on purchases made through affiliate links, at no extra cha
title: 2 Truths And A Lie, but with Science Experiments... (S4E4)
